article_title: Paul Ryan Introduces a GOP Budget Plan for 2015, Balances Budget in 10 Years, Repeals Obamacare

og.description: Today, House Budget Committee Chairman Paul Ryan introduced the House Republican budget for 2015. The plan, called "The Path to Prosperity," cuts $5.1 trillion in government spending, which includes repealing Obamacare (or The Affordable Care Act), making deep cuts to education, adding more money to national security, reforming the broken safety net (or welfare) system and …
